title: FSA Student Aid Estimator - User Data
description: User data required to execute FSA Student Aid Estimator and get federal student aid estimate

state.description: Student's state of legal residence (full name, e.g., 'Illinois')

grade_level.description: Student's grade level for 2026-27 school year

has_dependents.description: Does the student have children or other dependents they support?

personal_circumstances_none.description: Check if none of the special circumstances apply to the student (conditional field, only if has_dependents is 'no')

parent_state.description: Parent's state of residence (full name, e.g., 'Illinois')

family_size.description: Total number of people in student's family, including the student

parent_filed_taxes.description: Did the student's parent file taxes in 2024?

parent_income.description: Parent's adjusted gross income (required if parent_filed_taxes is 'yes'). Enter dollar amount without commas or symbols.

parent_assets.description: Parent's total assets including cash, savings, checking, investments, real estate excluding primary residence (required if parent_filed_taxes is 'yes'). Enter dollar amount without commas or symbols.

parent_child_support.description: Annual child support received by parent (required if parent_filed_taxes is 'yes'). Enter dollar amount without commas or symbols, or '0' if none.

student_filed_taxes.description: Did the student file taxes in 2024?
